CustomField.description: Used to combine values the separate fields used in either single or multi institution collaborations to one field for reporting.
CustomField.formula: IF( Cost_per_Year_Agreed_RollUp__c != 0 || Cost_per_Year_Agreed_RollUp__c != null, Cost_per_Year_Agreed_RollUp__c, Cost_per_Year_Agreed__c )
CustomField.label: Cost / Year - Agreed
